title: Tour de Suisse: Yates Soars into Lead as Pidcock, Carapaz Cede Time in Opening Salvo in Alps
content:
Yates and UAE are now firmly in control, with the next four stages stacked up across the Swiss Alps: 'The whole week is going to be super hard.'

Read the full article at Tour de Suisse: Yates Soars into Lead as Pidcock, Carapaz Cede Time in Opening Salvo in Alps on Velo.
author: ahood
